actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support of the Congress for the United Nations on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of the coming into force of the Charter of the United Nations.

summary.text: States that the Congress: (1) supports the original ideals of the United Nations; (2) reaffirms its original decision to extend an invitation to the United Nations to locate its headquarters in the United States; and (3) calls on the President to take steps to assure the United Nations that the United States is committed to the United Nations Charter.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support of the Congress for the United Nations on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of the coming into force of the Charter of the United Nations.
